author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Copa Holdings Announces Monthly Traffic Statistics For April 2018
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Copa Holdings SA:
* COPA HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES MONTHLY TRAFFIC STATISTICS FOR APRIL 2018
* APRIL 2018 RPM 1,712.5 MILLION, UP 11.9 PERCENT * APRIL 2018 ASM 2,090.7 MILLION, UP 12.1% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
